translated: or any other being, for the sake of the essence of the Amoghapaśa, should fast on the eighth day of the waxing phase, not speak to others, and recite the essence of the Amoghapaśa seven times. Blessed One,

original: des cha 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des cha 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te /
translated: they will attain twenty-one benefits in this very life.

original: nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na /
translated: What are the twenty-one?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽de'i lus @200a *//
analyzed: de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // de'i lus @200a *//
translated: Diseases will not arise in their bodies.

original: la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung na yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung na yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If diseases arise in their bodies due to the power of karma, they will be quickly pacified, and their bodies will become radiant and pleasing.

original: skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang / dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang / dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be loved by many people, and his faculties will be hidden.

original: de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: His aims will be accomplished.

original: de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te /🔽zhugs kyis mi tshig /
analyzed: de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te / zhugs kyis mi tshig /
translated: His aims will be accomplished, and they will not be stolen by thieves.🔽He will not be burned by fire.

original: chab kyis mi 'tshal /
analyzed: chab kyis mi 'tshal /
translated: He will not be carried away by water.

original: rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not be robbed by the power of the king.

original: de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te /🔽ser bas ma lags so //
analyzed: de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te / ser bas ma lags so //
translated: His activities will flourish.🔽He will not be harmed by hail.

original: chab kyi 'jigs par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: chab kyi 'jigs par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He will not have the fear of water.

original: rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so //
analyzed: rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so //
translated: He will not have the fear of wind and rain.

original: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na /
analyzed: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na /
translated: If one recites the essence mantra of Amoghapaśa seven times over ashes and water, and binds it to the directions, above, below, and in the field,

original: gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: all harm will be pacified.

original: gzi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be loved and liked by all beings.

original: de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not be afraid of enemies.

original: de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If he should be afraid of enemies, that fear will quickly disappear.

original: de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags /
analyzed: de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags /
translated: He will not be afraid of non-human beings.🔽He will not be afraid of spells.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te /
translated: He will not be afraid of the ḍākinīs.

original: de la nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not be afraid of the violent afflictions and secondary afflictions.

original: me dang / mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi @200b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me dang / mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi @200b 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not die from fire, weapons, or poison.

original: de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The gods will always be present to protect, guard, and conceal him.

original: gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Wherever they are born, they will not be separated from loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
translated: They will attain these twenty-one benefits.

original: gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: “Moreover, they will attain eight qualities.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time of death, they will see the noble Avalokiteśvara in the form of a bhikṣu.

original: bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will die happily.

original: lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not have confused views.

original: lag pa mi g-yob pa dang / rkang pa mi g-yob pa dang / bshang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lag pa mi g-yob pa dang / rkang pa mi g-yob pa dang / bshang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not wave their arms, they will not wave their legs, they will not defecate or urinate, and they will die on a bed.

original: dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have perfect mindfulness.

original: kha bub tu 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha bub tu 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not die face down.

original: 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time of death, they will have unimpeded eloquence.

original: de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be born in the buddha-field of their choice and will not be separated from their spiritual friends.

original: nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
translated: They should recite it three times a day, three times a night.

original: chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / ke'u dang / sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas sbang bar bgyi'o //🔽don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la @201a *//
analyzed: chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / ke'u dang / sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas sbang bar bgyi'o // don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la @201a *//
translated: They should avoid alcohol, meat, garlic, onions, and leeks, and should not eat after midday.🔽They should teach this Dharma discourse of the essence of the inexhaustible lasso

original: mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrag par bgyi'o //
translated: to sentient beings, regardless of whether they are powerful or not.

original: slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not be stingy with the master’s instructions.

original: 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni /
translated: In this way, they should be free from stains and abandon jealousy and stinginess.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te /
translated: The bodhisattvas are the ones who are so.

original: sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so //
translated: Because they will attain the enlightenment of the Buddhas for the sake of accomplishing the welfare of sentient beings, the bodhisattvas are included in the assembly.

original: byang chub ces bgyi ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub ces bgyi ba ni /
translated: Enlightenment is

original: shes rab lags /
analyzed: shes rab lags /
translated: wisdom.

original: sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni /
translated: The bodhisattva is

original: thabs lags te /
analyzed: thabs lags te /
translated: method.

original: chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa lags so //
translated: These two dharmas are attained only for the sake of the welfare of sentient beings.

original: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na /
analyzed: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na /
translated: If the Blessed One would allow me,

original: 'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde slad du bsgrag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde slad du bsgrag par bgyi'o //
translated: then in the presence of the Tathāgata I would proclaim this essence for the sake of the four assemblies and others who engage in evil, for their benefit, welfare, and happiness.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva noble Avalokiteśvara:

original: sems can dag pa /
analyzed: sems can dag pa /
translated: pure beings,

original: de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig /
analyzed: de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig /
translated: if you know that the time has come, then speak!

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te /
translated: The Tathāgata has already rejoiced in this,

analyzed: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa can rnams la pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and in future times he will act as the father of the bodhisattvas of the vehicle.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs @201b dbang phyug mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs @201b dbang phyug mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva noble Avalokiteśvara, without blinking, said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa /
translated: bowed to by all bodhisattvas,

original: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol /
translated: may you listen to me for the sake of the great assembly of beings, for the benefit of many beings, for the happiness of many beings, out of compassion for the world, for the welfare, benefit, and happiness of devas and humans.

analyzed: dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas who have gone, who go, and who will go to the other shore.

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to those who have gone to the other shore and to those who are going.

original: sh'a ra dva ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sh'a ra dva ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: byams pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Maitreya and all the other Bodhisattva Mahasattvas.

analyzed: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig /

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste /

original: 'di ni / dam pa sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / dam pa sgrub pa yin no //

original: zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste /
analyzed: zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste /

analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag @210b par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gzugs kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

translated: One will attain the perfection of worldly prosperity, and all beings, kings, ministers, brahmins, and householders will come under one’s control and be greatly honored.

analyzed: dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o //

original: de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o //

analyzed: bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'am mi @211a *// dge ba thams cad dam /

original: nyams pa'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyams pa'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro //

original: ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba'am /

analyzed: aom padma dha ra aa mo gha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru sv'ah'a /

analyzed: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so //

analyzed: aa mo gha p'a sha yantu bhu ba sv'ah'a /

analyzed: gdan gyi gsang sngags te /

analyzed: rig sngags 'grub pa'i padma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so //

analyzed: gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so //

analyzed: de lta bas na /

analyzed: dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang / gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o //
translated: I will perform all the necessary aspects, and I will perform the rites, the detailed rites as taught, and the mantra accomplishments for accomplishing reality.

original: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the knowledge-mantra holder will attain all unsurpassed accomplishments.

original: gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
analyzed: gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
translated: If the knowledge-mantra holder wishes to complete the rites,

original: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
analyzed: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
translated: by merely reciting this essence of Amoghapaśa, I will appear in front of the knowledge-mantra holder in my own form and fulfill all his wishes and hopes.

original: sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: All his negative actions, obscurations, and harms will be destroyed.

original: yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o //

original: cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will bestow the rites of the extensive ritual, the mudrā, the mantra, the essence mantra, the maṇḍala, and the supreme accomplishment of the maṇḍala of the liberation of the king of Amoghapāśa.

original: rig @222b sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig @222b sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur 'gyur ro //
translated: I will confer empowerment through the empowerment of the great cakravartin of the vidyādhara.

original: de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o //🔽don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o // don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will bestow the accomplishment of the attainment of reality.🔽I will bestow the great accomplishment of the attainment of the mundane and supramundane Amoghapāśa.

original: shin tu rgya che zhing bag tshad ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang / dpal stsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: shin tu rgya che zhing bag tshad ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang / dpal stsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will bestow the great prosperity of the most excellent and exalted worship and service of the entire world, which is vast and without limit, and the auspiciousness and glory of the gathering of wealth.

original: 'di la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'di la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o //
translated: One should not give rise to doubt or uncertainty about this, nor should one pay attention to anything else.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o //
translated: One should strive with supreme effort to be loving, compassionate, joyful, and impartial toward all sentient beings.

original: bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o //

original: bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o //
translated: One should recite the essence mantra of Amoghapaśa, focusing on the one who speaks the truth, delights in the truth, speaks pleasantly, and has a compassionate superior intention.

original: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o //

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o //

translated: Having brought to mind all the tathāgatas belonging to all the buddhafields in the ten directions, one should cultivate the recollection of the Buddha.

original: sangs @223a *// rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: sangs @223a *// rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o //

analyzed: 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas mngon sum du bsgom par bgyi'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim mo'i gzugs la phyag rgya bgyis te mdun du rtsva'i gding ba gting na skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste /

original: 'di ni / gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o //

analyzed: de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o //

analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang / sems can dag pa lag na padma can /

analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas //

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po lha min gsang ba pa /

analyzed: gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du //

analyzed: de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur //
